displayMusicArt.help: Disabling this will also disable "dynamic colors & background".

filter.text:
Filter Music Art
(Require enabling "Display Music Art")
filter.help: Add gradient filter above the art. This setting is ignored when "Display Music Art" is disabled.

dynamicBackground.text:
Use dynamic background 
(Require enabling "Display Music Art")
dynamicBackground.help:
Use colors from the song art for the background.
This setting is ignored when "Display Music Art" is disabled.

backgroundColor.help: Changing this setting lags the wallpaper, give it a moment when changing. This setting is ignored when "Use dynamic background" is enabled.

lineColor.help: Changing this setting lags the wallpaper, give it a moment when changing. This setting is ignored when "Use dynamic background" is enabled.

useDynamicColors.text:
Use dynamic colors
(Require enabling "Display Music Art")
useDynamicColors.help: Use colors from the song art for colors. This setting is ignored when "Display Music Art" is disabled.

primaryColor.help: This setting is ignored when "Use dynamic colors" is enabled.

secondaryColor.help: This setting is ignored when "Use dynamic colors" is enabled.

musixmatchKey.help: Get your free API key from https://www.musixmatch.com/apis - leave empty to skip this source

geniusKey.help: Get your access token from https://genius.com/api-clients - leave empty to skip this source
